CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Loop generates a workspace after your Teams meeting
CurrentVersion.description: A workspace is jumpstarted and actively updated as new materials are shared in Teams to enable ongoing collaboration within Loop.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Loop generates a workspace after your Teams meeting
OldVersion.description: A workspace is jumpstarted and actively updated as new materials are shared in Teams to enable ongoing collaboration within Loop.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Search past sessions in Copilot Chat
CurrentVersion.description: Search through your past Copilot conversations in Copilot Chat.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Search past sessions in Copilot Chat
OldVersion.description: Search through your past Copilot conversations in Copilot Chat.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): LLM generated titles for Copilot Chat sessions

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): LLM generated titles for Copilot Chat sessions
OldVersion.description: Easily locate your Copilot Chat sessions with LLM generated titles.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Chat with Copilot in Outlook for Mac
CurrentVersion.description: The same Microsoft Copilot experience you can get in the Microsoft Teams app, at copilot.microsoft.com (work mode) and in other places is now available from within Microsoft Outlook for Mac. You can find the Copilot app in the left app bar.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Chat with Copilot in Outlook for Mac
OldVersion.description: The same Microsoft Copilot experience you can get in the Microsoft Teams app, at copilot.microsoft.com (work mode) and in other places is now available from within Microsoft Outlook for Mac. You can find the Copilot app in the left app bar.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Create allow directly in Tenant Allow/Block List
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can create an allow inside the Tenant Allow/Block List to override bulk, spam, and regular confidence phish verdicts directly.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Create allow directly in Tenant Allow/Block List
OldVersion.description: Admins can create an allow inside the Tenant Allow/Block List to override bulk, spam, and regular confidence phish verdicts directly.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Org Explorer in Outlook for Mac
CurrentVersion.description: Org Explorer for Outlook helps you to visualize and explore your company’s internal structure, work teams, and individual roles. This feature will now also be available in Outlook for Mac.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Org Explorer in Outlook for Mac
OldVersion.description: Org Explorer for Outlook helps you to visualize and explore your company’s internal structure, work teams, and individual roles. This feature will now also be available in Outlook for Mac.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Ground prompts using SharePoint Sites
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to search for and select SharePoint Sites in CIQ to scope their prompts to.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Ground prompts using SharePoint Sites
OldVersion.description: Users will be able to search for and select SharePoint Sites in CIQ to scope their prompts to.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Detailed error description for LMS setup failures
CurrentVersion.description: LMS setup form will now have detailed error description for LMS setup failures.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Detailed error description for LMS setup failures
OldVersion.description: LMS setup form will now have detailed error description for LMS setup failures.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Admin email support for Report a problem
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can designate an email address for receiving ‘Report a problem’ submissions from users in Teams Rooms on Android. The email address can be set through device settings and the Teams admin center.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Admin email support for Report a problem
OldVersion.description: Admins can designate an email address for receiving ‘Report a problem’ submissions from users in Teams Rooms on Android. The email address can be set through device settings and the Teams admin center.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Elevating top settings and improving settings page navigability
CurrentVersion.description: To make finding browser settings more efficient, Microsoft Edge is introducing three navigation improvements to Edge Settings. We are making no changes to the functionality of any setting and all settings will remain on the same page as they are today but will be behind clickable sections. The first is introducing quick access to the most used actions on the landing page of Edge Settings. Second, each densely populated page—Privacy, search, and services; Appearance; Cookies and site permissions; System and performance—will feature quick access to its most used actions. Third, for these same pages, each section will now click-through to its respective sub-settings (similar to a table of contents).

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Elevating top settings and improving settings page navigability
OldVersion.description: To make finding browser settings more efficient, Microsoft Edge is introducing three navigation improvements to Edge Settings. We are making no changes to the functionality of any setting and all settings will remain on the same page as they are today but will be behind clickable sections. The first is introducing quick access to the most used actions on the landing page of Edge Settings. Second, each densely populated page—Privacy, search, and services; Appearance; Cookies and site permissions; System and performance—will feature quick access to its most used actions. Third, for these same pages, each section will now click-through to its respective sub-settings (similar to a table of contents).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Summarize files shared in Teams chat with Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Summarize action on files shared in Teams chat, will allow users to summarize files with one click using Copilot within one-on-one or group chats. It will work on common file types like Word and PDF to start with and other formats will be added over due course. This requires a Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Summarize files shared in Teams chat with Copilot
OldVersion.description: Summarize action on files shared in Teams chat, will allow users to summarize files with one click using Copilot within one-on-one or group chats. It will work on common file types like Word and PDF to start with and other formats will be added over due course. This requires a Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Improved Microsoft Lists links in Teams messages
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Lists links in Teams including list item links and form links will now unfurl when shared in Teams messages making them easier to find and access within Teams messages and inside shared tab in chats.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Improved Microsoft Lists links in Teams messages
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Lists links in Teams including list item links and form links will now unfurl when shared in Teams messages making them easier to find and access within Teams messages and inside shared tab in chats.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot web grounding now available in the Copilot app in Teams and Outlook
CurrentVersion.description: Ground your Copilot chat conversations with the latest information from the web in the Copilot app in Teams and Outlook

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot web grounding now available in the Copilot app in Teams and Outlook
OldVersion.description: Ground your Copilot chat conversations with the latest information from the web in the Copilot app in Teams and Outlook

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365) – AI enabled file summaries on Teams mobile
CurrentVersion.description: Quickly get a summary of Word, PPT, and PDF files that were shard with you in chat, without leaving your flow of work. Tap the summary icon on the file, and get a summary generated by Copilot. Now you can consume and comprehend the content without reading the entire document on a small mobile screen.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365) – AI enabled file summaries on Teams mobile
OldVersion.description: Quickly get a summary of Word, PPT, and PDF files that were shard with you in chat, without leaving your flow of work. Tap the summary icon on the file, and get a summary generated by Copilot. Now you can consume and comprehend the content without reading the entire document on a small mobile screen.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Admin Center – Admins can disable ability to send messages in meeting chat before and after the meeting
CurrentVersion.description: We are expanding the existing ‘Meeting chat’ control in Teams Admin Center with two new values, “In-meeting only for everyone” and “In-meeting only except anonymous users.” In Teams Admin Center, admins will see a setting called ‘Meeting chat’ under Meetings > Meeting Policies > Meeting Engagement. Admins can now select from five options in the ‘Meeting chat’ setting: (1) “On for everyone” (2) “On for everyone but anonymous users” (3) “Off” (4) “In-meeting only for everyone” (5) “In-meeting only except anonymous users.”  Admins can select the “In-meeting only” values to disable participants’ ability to send messages in the meeting chat before or after the meeting, for meetings organized by specific users in their tenant. When one of these “In-meeting only” values are selected, participants can read past chat history but no one can send messages in the meeting chat unless the meeting is active.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Admin Center – Admins can disable ability to send messages in meeting chat before and after the meeting
OldVersion.description: We are expanding the existing ‘Meeting chat’ control in Teams Admin Center with two new values, “In-meeting only for everyone” and “In-meeting only except anonymous users.” In Teams Admin Center, admins will see a setting called ‘Meeting chat’ under Meetings > Meeting Policies > Meeting Engagement. Admins can now select from five options in the ‘Meeting chat’ setting: (1) “On for everyone” (2) “On for everyone but anonymous users” (3) “Off” (4) “In-meeting only for everyone” (5) “In-meeting only except anonymous users.”  Admins can select the “In-meeting only” values to disable participants’ ability to send messages in the meeting chat before or after the meeting, for meetings organized by specific users in their tenant. When one of these “In-meeting only” values are selected, participants can read past chat history but no one can send messages in the meeting chat unless the meeting is active.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Filter between active and archived teams in Shifts app schedules
CurrentVersion.description: Coming soon for the Shifts app in Microsoft Teams: An enhanced All schedules view with a new dropdown filter, enabling you to easily switch between active and archived teams. This feature helps reduce clutter, allowing managers and frontline workers to concentrate on the schedules of active teams.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Filter between active and archived teams in Shifts app schedules
OldVersion.description: Coming soon for the Shifts app in Microsoft Teams: An enhanced All schedules view with a new dropdown filter, enabling you to easily switch between active and archived teams. This feature helps reduce clutter, allowing managers and frontline workers to concentrate on the schedules of active teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Automatic installation and update of the Network Device Interface (NDI) in Teams (Windows Only)
CurrentVersion.description: This update now enables users to install and update the Network Device Interface (NDI) automatically in Microsoft Teams without any manual process. This allows organizations to broadcast audio and video streams from Teams instances to a user's local network. It is currently only available on Windows devices.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Automatic installation and update of the Network Device Interface (NDI) in Teams (Windows Only)
OldVersion.description: This update now enables users to install and update the Network Device Interface (NDI) automatically in Microsoft Teams without any manual process. This allows organizations to broadcast audio and video streams from Teams instances to a user's local network. It is currently only available on Windows devices.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - SharePoint Online extends library permissions to downloaded files.
CurrentVersion.description: This new capability ties together SharePoint Online library permissions with Purview sensitivity labeling and protection. SharePoint Online document library owners can set a label on the library, automatically applying that label to all unprotected and unlabeled Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and PDF files at rest in the target library. This simplifies labeling in bulk across document libraries in an organization. This capability also helps protect files as they egress from the original document library, such as for collaboration purposes or attempted exfiltration. Files downloaded from these libraries are protected at download. Users accessing these files outside of SharePoint Online have their rights evaluated in real time against the online copy of the document. Changes to user permissions on the online copy of the document are reflected on downloaded copy, including full access removal. This provides a more streamlined way to revoke access to documents for individual users, versus revoking access on a per-document basis.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - SharePoint Online extends library permissions to downloaded files.
OldVersion.description: This new capability ties together SharePoint Online library permissions with Purview sensitivity labeling and protection. SharePoint Online document library owners can set a label on the library, automatically applying that label to all unprotected and unlabeled Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and PDF files at rest in the target library. This simplifies labeling in bulk across document libraries in an organization. This capability also helps protect files as they egress from the original document library, such as for collaboration purposes or attempted exfiltration. Files downloaded from these libraries are protected at download. Users accessing these files outside of SharePoint Online have their rights evaluated in real time against the online copy of the document. Changes to user permissions on the online copy of the document are reflected on downloaded copy, including full access removal. This provides a more streamlined way to revoke access to documents for individual users, versus revoking access on a per-document basis.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Agents in OneDrive
CurrentVersion.description: Find yourself referencing the same files to Copilot in OneDrive? We are bringing the power of agents to OneDrive, allowing you to build, use, and share your own agents using files and content stored in your OneDrive. This feature requires a Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 license and will be available to commercial customers on OneDrive Web.

OldVersion.title: OneDrive: Agents in OneDrive
OldVersion.description: Find yourself referencing the same files to Copilot in OneDrive? We are bringing the power of agents to OneDrive, allowing you to build, use, and share your own agents using files and content stored in your OneDrive. This feature requires a Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 license and will be available to commercial customers on OneDrive Web.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Security Posture Management for AI
CurrentVersion.description:
Microsoft Purview AI Hub is released to general availability. Along with this release, the name has been rebranded to Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI (DSPM for AI) and capabilities have been added that include supporting admin units, displaying AI policies that were created in Purview solutions, and supporting additional AI apps. A version of DSPM for AI is also available to additional licensing, specifically Microsoft 365 E3 and Microsoft 365 Copilot licenses. 

The AI hub in Microsoft Purview is a centralized location to gain insights into generative AI activity, including the sensitive data flowing in AI prompts, both for Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 and non-Microsoft AI applications.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Security Posture Management for AI
OldVersion.description:
Microsoft Purview AI Hub is released to general availability. Along with this release, the name has been rebranded to Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI (DSPM for AI) and capabilities have been added that include supporting admin units, displaying AI policies that were created in Purview solutions, and supporting additional AI apps. A version of DSPM for AI is also available to additional licensing, specifically Microsoft 365 E3 and Microsoft 365 Copilot licenses. 

The AI hub in Microsoft Purview is a centralized location to gain insights into generative AI activity, including the sensitive data flowing in AI prompts, both for Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 and non-Microsoft AI applications.

CurrentVersion.title: Bookings: New Queue experience in Bookings to manage appointments for the day with real time attendee wait status and SMS reminders
CurrentVersion.description: The new Queue experience in Bookings enables schedulers and Bookings users to view the status and monitor all scheduled in-person and virtual appointments. Users can quickly create or view an appointment and send staff and attendees email reminders and SMS text notifications.

OldVersion.title: Bookings: New Queue experience in Bookings to manage appointments for the day with real time attendee wait status and SMS reminders
OldVersion.description: The new Queue experience in Bookings enables schedulers and Bookings users to view the status and monitor all scheduled in-person and virtual appointments. Users can quickly create or view an appointment and send staff and attendees email reminders and SMS text notifications.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Shared tab in channel
CurrentVersion.description: he Files tab in channels is now "Shared". In addition to files that are currently shown from document library, new experience will also show all the files and links shared in the channel conversations. This makes it easier to find content all in one place.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Shared tab in channel
OldVersion.description: he Files tab in channels is now "Shared". In addition to files that are currently shown from document library, new experience will also show all the files and links shared in the channel conversations. This makes it easier to find content all in one place.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Open file links preference to extend across M365 apps
CurrentVersion.description: When it comes to how links to cloud-hosted Word, Excel, or PowerPoint files should open, you may prefer they open in a browser, desktop apps, or directly in Teams. Now, your Teams file open preference will extend to across Microsoft 365 apps starting with classic Outlook, Word, Excel and PowerPoint. This makes the open file experience consistent on your Windows PC/device. If you prefer, you will still be able to choose your Teams file open preference separately.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Open file links preference to extend across M365 apps
OldVersion.description: When it comes to how links to cloud-hosted Word, Excel, or PowerPoint files should open, you may prefer they open in a browser, desktop apps, or directly in Teams. Now, your Teams file open preference will extend to across Microsoft 365 apps starting with classic Outlook, Word, Excel and PowerPoint. This makes the open file experience consistent on your Windows PC/device. If you prefer, you will still be able to choose your Teams file open preference separately.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams meeting Notes now available in Microsoft Teams for Education
CurrentVersion.description: Teams meeting Notes, powered by Loop, is now available in Microsoft Teams for Education. Notes are Loop components in Teams meetings and chats that allow end users to co-create and collaborate on their meeting agenda, notes, and action items that can be co-authored and edited by everyone. Since Notes are Loop components, they stay in sync across all the places they have been shared. Assigned Tasks automatically sync with ToDo and Planner.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams meeting Notes now available in Microsoft Teams for Education
OldVersion.description: Teams meeting Notes, powered by Loop, is now available in Microsoft Teams for Education. Notes are Loop components in Teams meetings and chats that allow end users to co-create and collaborate on their meeting agenda, notes, and action items that can be co-authored and edited by everyone. Since Notes are Loop components, they stay in sync across all the places they have been shared. Assigned Tasks automatically sync with ToDo and Planner.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Detailed error description for LMS setup failures
CurrentVersion.description: LMS setup form will now have detailed error description for LMS setup failures.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Audio summary of your file
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot can generate audio summaries of your file, making information easy to consume anywhere.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Audio summary of your file
OldVersion.description: Copilot can generate audio summaries of your file, making information easy to consume anywhere.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Support Import and Export of S/MIME digital certificates in New Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Users who do not have S/MIME digital certificates installed now can use Import functionality to install S/MIME certificate files into their Windows machine. Similarly, Export functionality can be used to export S/MIME certificates with new password. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Support Import and Export of S/MIME digital certificates in New Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: Users who do not have S/MIME digital certificates installed now can use Import functionality to install S/MIME certificate files into their Windows machine. Similarly, Export functionality can be used to export S/MIME certificates with new password. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Agents for Microsoft 365 Copilot available in Copilot Chat in classic Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: We will be adding declarative agents support for agents in Copilot Chat in Outlook. This roadmap item tracks availability in classic Outlook for Windows.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Agents for Microsoft 365 Copilot available in Copilot Chat in classic Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: We will be adding declarative agents support for agents in Copilot Chat in Outlook. This roadmap item tracks availability in classic Outlook for Windows.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: MIP sensitivity label support S/MIME in new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: New Outlook for Windows will support S/MIME (Secure/Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions) signing and encryption as an outcome of sensitivity labels. Admins can use set label advanced setting to define the label to have S/MIME sign or encryption or both, and emails with those labels applied will enforce S/MIME sign and encrypt accordingly. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: MIP sensitivity label support S/MIME in new Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: New Outlook for Windows will support S/MIME (Secure/Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions) signing and encryption as an outcome of sensitivity labels. Admins can use set label advanced setting to define the label to have S/MIME sign or encryption or both, and emails with those labels applied will enforce S/MIME sign and encrypt accordingly. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: App ratings will be available int he unfurled links.
CurrentVersion.description: App ratings will appear on the unfurled links for shared apps and agents to allow users who rely on ratings to evaluate apps prior to installing.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: App ratings will be available int he unfurled links.
OldVersion.description: App ratings will appear on the unfurled links for shared apps and agents to allow users who rely on ratings to evaluate apps prior to installing.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Share apps from app bar via right click
CurrentVersion.description: Allow users to right-click and share apps directly from the app icon on hover, while using the app.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Share apps from app bar via right click
OldVersion.description: Allow users to right-click and share apps directly from the app icon on hover, while using the app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Availability of 'Add' and 'view details' buttons on unfurled links.
CurrentVersion.description: Option to 'Add' and 'View details' for an app will appear in the unfurled links for seamless installation of apps & agents.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Availability of 'Add' and 'view details' buttons on unfurled links.
OldVersion.description: Option to 'Add' and 'View details' for an app will appear in the unfurled links for seamless installation of apps & agents.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: New Outlook for Windows - Reply To header
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to toggle a "Reply to" field in the email compose form, which will allow them to add one or multiple addresses which will be used as the recipients for any replies to that message. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Townhall concurrent attendees increase to 100,000
CurrentVersion.description: Organizers of town hall instances can now reach wider audience in a single event with an expansion to a maximum of 100,000 simultaneous attendees. This increase serves as a significant jump from the previous attendee cap of 50,000 for organizers with a Teams Premium license. The quality and stability of town halls up to this new limit will remain constant, providing high-quality and reliable content to participants. For events with more than 20,000 concurrent attendees, some interactivity features are disabled for all attendees. Organizations can get support for audiences up to 100,000 concurrent attendees by selecting the Max Capacity limit to be as high as desired up to 100,000. Reaching out to the Microsoft 365 Live Event Assistance Program (LEAP) for assistance (Microsoft 365 Live Event Assistance Program – Microsoft Adoption) is recommended for every event. This feature is available for town hall organizers that have an active Teams Premium license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams Town hall Organizer/Co-Organizer/Presenter Join as Attendee
CurrentVersion.description: Event crew members will soon be able to join a live Town hall as an Attendee during the event to monitor the experience for viewers.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Designer is now part of Copilot, enhanced with new template and slide suggestions
CurrentVersion.description: Designer is now part of Copilot. Copilot suggestions now brings you familiar Designer slide layout and presentation template suggestions in a vertical gallery, along with new capabilities.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Authoring with M365 Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Pulse authors can now work with M365 Copilot to add a question, rewrite a question, and create a survey from scratch to quickly create and send their surveys to their teams to collect feedback. M365 Copilot can seamlessly capture the author's needs to recommend survey questions that fit their unique scenario.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage - Create articles and questions more easily with the updated "Create new" button.
CurrentVersion.description:
We are excited to announce the addition of two post creation options—Article and Question—to the centralized creation button in Viva Engage for premium users. Starting April 2025, a Viva Engage premium licensed user will be able to create an article or a question post type directly by clicking on the "Create new" button, easing the process of creation of these post types, while also helping users discover them quicker. Kindly note that this roll out does not entail adding new types of content creation, but brings forth a unified and easier way to create these post types when a user is already licensed to use them.
By 'Viva Engage premium licensed user', we mean this feature is available for users licensed to the Microsoft Viva Suite or the Microsoft Viva Employee Communications and Communities Suite.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: DLP Policy Tip Support in Outlook for Mac
CurrentVersion.description: DLP policy tips for Microsoft Outlook for Mac provide real-time notifications to users when their email contains sensitive information that violates organizational policies. Users can see policy tips directly in the mail tip UI and have the option to remove non-compliant recipients or override the policy if necessary. This feature ensures compliance by alerting users to potential data loss risks before sending emails.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: DLP Policy Tip Support in Outlook Mobile
CurrentVersion.description: DLP policy tip support for Outlook Mobile enhances data loss prevention measures on mobile devices by providing real-time alerts to help users avoid accidentally sharing sensitive information, ensuring compliance with organizational policies.

CurrentVersion.description: A workspace is jumpstarted and actively updated as new materials are shared in Teams to enable ongoing collaboration within Loop.

Files downloaded from these libraries are protected at download. Users accessing these files outside of SharePoint Online have their rights evaluated in real time against the online copy of the document. Changes to user permissions on the online copy of the document are reflected on downloaded copy, including full access removal. This provides a more streamlined way to revoke access to documents for individual users, versus revoking access on a per-document basis.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Agents in OneDrive
CurrentVersion.description: Find yourself referencing the same files to Copilot in OneDrive? We are bringing the power of agents to OneDrive, allowing you to build, use, and share your own agents using files and content stored in your OneDrive. This feature requires a Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 license and will be available to commercial customers on OneDrive Web.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Security Posture Management for AI
CurrentVersion.description:
Microsoft Purview AI Hub is released to general availability. Along with this release, the name has been rebranded to Microsoft Purview Data Security Posture Management for AI (DSPM for AI) and capabilities have been added that include supporting admin units, displaying AI policies that were created in Purview solutions, and supporting additional AI apps. A version of DSPM for AI is also available to additional licensing, specifically Microsoft 365 E3 and Microsoft 365 Copilot licenses. 

The AI hub in Microsoft Purview is a centralized location to gain insights into generative AI activity, including the sensitive data flowing in AI prompts, both for Microsoft Copilot for Microsoft 365 and non-Microsoft AI applications.

CurrentVersion.title: Bookings: New Queue experience in Bookings to manage appointments for the day with real time attendee wait status and SMS reminders
CurrentVersion.description: The new Queue experience in Bookings enables schedulers and Bookings users to view the status and monitor all scheduled in-person and virtual appointments. Users can quickly create or view an appointment and send staff and attendees email reminders and SMS text notifications.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Shared tab in channel
CurrentVersion.description: he Files tab in channels is now "Shared". In addition to files that are currently shown from document library, new experience will also show all the files and links shared in the channel conversations. This makes it easier to find content all in one place.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Open file links preference to extend across M365 apps
CurrentVersion.description: When it comes to how links to cloud-hosted Word, Excel, or PowerPoint files should open, you may prefer they open in a browser, desktop apps, or directly in Teams. Now, your Teams file open preference will extend to across Microsoft 365 apps starting with classic Outlook, Word, Excel and PowerPoint. This makes the open file experience consistent on your Windows PC/device. If you prefer, you will still be able to choose your Teams file open preference separately.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams meeting Notes now available in Microsoft Teams for Education
CurrentVersion.description: Teams meeting Notes, powered by Loop, is now available in Microsoft Teams for Education. Notes are Loop components in Teams meetings and chats that allow end users to co-create and collaborate on their meeting agenda, notes, and action items that can be co-authored and edited by everyone. Since Notes are Loop components, they stay in sync across all the places they have been shared. Assigned Tasks automatically sync with ToDo and Planner.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Detailed error description for LMS setup failures
CurrentVersion.description: LMS setup form will now have detailed error description for LMS setup failures.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Audio summary of your file
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot can generate audio summaries of your file, making information easy to consume anywhere.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Support Import and Export of S/MIME digital certificates in New Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Users who do not have S/MIME digital certificates installed now can use Import functionality to install S/MIME certificate files into their Windows machine. Similarly, Export functionality can be used to export S/MIME certificates with new password. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Agents for Microsoft 365 Copilot available in Copilot Chat in classic Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: We will be adding declarative agents support for agents in Copilot Chat in Outlook. This roadmap item tracks availability in classic Outlook for Windows.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: MIP sensitivity label support S/MIME in new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: New Outlook for Windows will support S/MIME (Secure/Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions) signing and encryption as an outcome of sensitivity labels. Admins can use set label advanced setting to define the label to have S/MIME sign or encryption or both, and emails with those labels applied will enforce S/MIME sign and encrypt accordingly. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: App ratings will be available int he unfurled links.
CurrentVersion.description: App ratings will appear on the unfurled links for shared apps and agents to allow users who rely on ratings to evaluate apps prior to installing.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Share apps from app bar via right click
CurrentVersion.description: Allow users to right-click and share apps directly from the app icon on hover, while using the app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Availability of 'Add' and 'view details' buttons on unfurled links.
CurrentVersion.description: Option to 'Add' and 'View details' for an app will appear in the unfurled links for seamless installation of apps & agents.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: New Outlook for Windows - Reply To header
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to toggle a "Reply to" field in the email compose form, which will allow them to add one or multiple addresses which will be used as the recipients for any replies to that message. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Townhall concurrent attendees increase to 100,000
CurrentVersion.description: Organizers of town hall instances can now reach wider audience in a single event with an expansion to a maximum of 100,000 simultaneous attendees. This increase serves as a significant jump from the previous attendee cap of 50,000 for organizers with a Teams Premium license. The quality and stability of town halls up to this new limit will remain constant, providing high-quality and reliable content to participants. For events with more than 20,000 concurrent attendees, some interactivity features are disabled for all attendees. Organizations can get support for audiences up to 100,000 concurrent attendees by selecting the Max Capacity limit to be as high as desired up to 100,000. Reaching out to the Microsoft 365 Live Event Assistance Program (LEAP) for assistance (Microsoft 365 Live Event Assistance Program – Microsoft Adoption) is recommended for every event. This feature is available for town hall organizers that have an active Teams Premium license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams Town hall Organizer/Co-Organizer/Presenter Join as Attendee
CurrentVersion.description: Event crew members will soon be able to join a live Town hall as an Attendee during the event to monitor the experience for viewers.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Designer is now part of Copilot, enhanced with new template and slide suggestions
CurrentVersion.description: Designer is now part of Copilot. Copilot suggestions now brings you familiar Designer slide layout and presentation template suggestions in a vertical gallery, along with new capabilities.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Authoring with M365 Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Pulse authors can now work with M365 Copilot to add a question, rewrite a question, and create a survey from scratch to quickly create and send their surveys to their teams to collect feedback. M365 Copilot can seamlessly capture the author's needs to recommend survey questions that fit their unique scenario.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage - Create articles and questions more easily with the updated "Create new" button.
CurrentVersion.description:
We are excited to announce the addition of two post creation options—Article and Question—to the centralized creation button in Viva Engage for premium users. Starting April 2025, a Viva Engage premium licensed user will be able to create an article or a question post type directly by clicking on the "Create new" button, easing the process of creation of these post types, while also helping users discover them quicker. Kindly note that this roll out does not entail adding new types of content creation, but brings forth a unified and easier way to create these post types when a user is already licensed to use them.
By 'Viva Engage premium licensed user', we mean this feature is available for users licensed to the Microsoft Viva Suite or the Microsoft Viva Employee Communications and Communities Suite.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: DLP Policy Tip Support in Outlook for Mac
CurrentVersion.description: DLP policy tips for Microsoft Outlook for Mac provide real-time notifications to users when their email contains sensitive information that violates organizational policies. Users can see policy tips directly in the mail tip UI and have the option to remove non-compliant recipients or override the policy if necessary. This feature ensures compliance by alerting users to potential data loss risks before sending emails.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: DLP Policy Tip Support in Outlook Mobile
CurrentVersion.description: DLP policy tip support for Outlook Mobile enhances data loss prevention measures on mobile devices by providing real-time alerts to help users avoid accidentally sharing sensitive information, ensuring compliance with organizational policies.
